original_text: But the land could not grow enough food for all of them to eat. They could not all live together in the same place, because they had so many animals and people with them.
korean_text: 그 땅이 그들이 동거하기에 넉넉하지 못하였으니 이는 그들의 소유가 많아서 동거할 수 없었음이니라

sentences.original_text: But the land could not grow enough food
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 땅은 충분한 음식을 키울 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: for all of them to eat
They could not all live together
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 함께 살 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: because they had so many animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너무 많은 가축을 가지고 있었기 때문입니다
